t: How to Sell on Amazon Handmade | 2025 Guide - Wise
s: June 27, 2024 - Audience reach: Amazon Handmade offers access to Amazon's vast customer base, while Etsy attracts buyers specifically looking for vintage and unique items. Fees: Amazon Handmade charges a fee of 15% of the transaction value, while Etsy has a 6.5% transaction fee and a 3% payment processing fee.
